front.title: Multiple IPv4 - IPv6 mapped IPv6 address (M46A)

abstract.t: This document specifies Multiple IPv4 - IPv6 mapped IPv6 address(M46A) spefification. M46A is an IPv4-mapped IPv6 address with a plane ID. Unique allocation of plane id value enables IPv4 private address unique in IPv6 address space. This address may use IPv4 over IPv6 encapsulation and IPv4 - IPv6 translation.
